verses.name: Hebrews 12:13
verses.text: And make straight paths for your feet, lest that which is lame be turned out of the way; but let it rather be healed.

verses.name: Hebrews 12:14
verses.text: Follow peace with all men, and holiness, without which no man shall see the Lord:

verses.name: Hebrews 12:15
verses.text: Looking diligently lest any man fail of the grace of God; lest any root of bitterness springing up trouble you, and thereby many be defiled;

verses.name: Hebrews 12:16
verses.text: Lest there be any fornicator, or profane person, as Esau, who for one morsel of meat sold his birthright.
